content: this knit-look crochet ear warmer headband is narrower shaped at the back to avoid all that bulk this way it will look perfect in any situation wearing it over your hair under your hair at the back with a messy bun or with a ponytail **don t miss a thing ** subscribe to my free newsletter 1 to stay updated with new free crochet patterns tutorials and other yarnie things follow me on instagram 2 follow my fb page myhobbyiscrochet 3 for daily free crochet pattern links share your projects and get advice in our facebook group my hobby is crochet 4 get more crochet inspiration in my pinterest boards 5 check out my youtube channel 6 1 https //landing mailerlite com/webforms/landing/n1x3g9 2 https //www instagram com/myhobbyiscrochet/ hl=de 3 https //www facebook com/myhobbyiscrochet ref=hl 4 https //www facebook com/groups/myhobbyiscrochet/ 5 https //www pinterest de/myhobbyiscroche/ 6 https //www youtube com/@myhobbyiscrochetblog
